column4: i have a prob with internet connection, i heard it's quite common. there are wirless networks i can't connect (like my parents home or my university), but when i switch to windows everyting is fine. how can i solve it?
what wifi chip do you use?
what wifi chip do you use?
i'm not sure what it is.. i have a laptop and i use it's wifi
run:  sudo lshw -C network     there will be a product line for the device, what is it?
also run:  lsb_release -sc   what is output?
have you tried connecting to a wired connection and getting full updates?

now i'm at my home and (as u can see) i have internet in my ubuntu (12.04). after the first code it asked for a password, but when i typed it it said it's incorrect (and i tried several times). to the second code it answered: precise. i don't have wired internet...
the first line worked, it says: ActionParsnip
the first line worked, it says: ^Cneta@ubuntu:~$
the pasword is your user password, you get no feedback, just keep typing
now it says somethig really long:*-network
ok, run:  sudo iwlist scan   do you see wireless networks?
lo        Interface doesn't support scanning.
so it sees the wireless networks, do you use a hidden ssid?
try: echo "blacklist iwlagn" | sudo tee -a /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist.conf
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1940468
that code says: blacklist iwlagn. i don't know what is a hidden ssid
then reboot to test
i have a prob- i'm new in ubuntu, and i don't understand how to install prog the i downloded from the internet, like in the link u gave me..
i downloded what was written in the link, but i don't know how to install it
